properties.name: Path
properties.expression: function rotpoint(point, pivot, Angle) {    const offset = sub(pivot, point);    return add(sub(offset, [offset[0] * Math.cos(Angle) - offset[1] * Math.sin(Angle), offset[1] * Math.cos(Angle) + offset[0] * Math.sin(Angle)]), point);}function intersect(pt1, pt2, pt3, pt4) {    const alp = (pt2[1] - pt1[1]) / (pt2[0] - pt1[0]);    const bet = (pt4[1] - pt3[1]) / (pt4[0] - pt3[0]);    if ((alp - bet) > -0.01 && (alp - bet) < 0.01) { return [(pt2[0] + pt3[0]) * 0.5, (pt2[1] + pt3[1]) * 0.5] }    else {        const intersectx = ((alp * pt1[0]) - (bet * pt3[0]) + (pt3[1] - pt1[1])) / (alp - bet);        return [intersectx, (alp * (intersectx - pt1[0])) + pt1[1]];    }}function pointSide(ptA, ptB, ptC) {    const X = (ptB[0] - ptA[0]) * (ptC[1] - ptA[1]) - (ptB[1] - ptA[1]) * (ptC[0] - ptA[0]);    if (X < 0) { return true } else { return false }}const startctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ start }}');const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const p1 = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value;const ikfkfrkangsids = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value;const s1 = ikfkfrkangsids[1];const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const s3 = effect('Finger')('Tip Length') * scaleFacs;const angles = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value;const a1mod = degreesToRadians(angles[1]);const a2mod = degreesToRadians(thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Extension Group').transform.rotation);const p2ikfkfrk = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value;const a2rad = - a2mod + Math.PI;const p3ikfkfrk = p2ikfkfrk + [s3*Math.sin(a2rad), s3*Math.cos(a2rad)];const c2 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('End Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const c1 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Middle Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const c3 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Tip Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const a1taperOffAng = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / s1, -1, 1));const r3low = [c2 * Math.sin(a1taperOffAng), s1 + c2 * Math.cos(a1taperOffAng)];const r3up = [c1 * Math.sin(a1taperOffAng), c1 * Math.cos(a1taperOffAng)];const a2taperOffAng = Math.acos(clamp((c2 - c3) / s3, -1, 1));const r1low = [c3 * Math.sin(a2taperOffAng), s3 + c3 * Math.cos(a2taperOffAng)];const r1up = [c2 * Math.sin(a2taperOffAng), c2 * Math.cos(a2taperOffAng)];const upr = rotpoint(add([r3up[0], -r3up[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const udr = rotpoint(add([r3low[0], -r3low[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const lpr = rotpoint(add([r1up[0], -r1up[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const ldr = rotpoint(add([r1low[0], -r1low[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const upl = rotpoint(add([-r3up[0], -r3up[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const udl = rotpoint(add([-r3low[0], -r3low[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const lpl = rotpoint(add([-r1up[0], -r1up[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const ldl = rotpoint(add([-r1low[0], -r1low[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const rjoint = intersect(upr, udr, lpr, ldr);const ljoint = intersect(upl, udl, lpl, ldl);let outerJoint = rjoint;if (pointSide(p1, p2ikfkfrk, p3ikfkfrk)) {	outerJoint = ljoint;	}createPath([outerJoint, p2ikfkfrk], [], [], false);

properties.name: End
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}'); const angles = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value;const diff = Math.abs(angles[1] - thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Extension Group').transform.rotation);linear(diff, thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Minimum Angle'), thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Maximum Angle'), 0, 100)

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: function rotpoint(point, pivot, Angle) {    const offset = sub(pivot, point);    return add(sub(offset, [offset[0] * Math.cos(Angle) - offset[1] * Math.sin(Angle), offset[1] * Math.cos(Angle) + offset[0] * Math.sin(Angle)]), point);}function intersect(pt1, pt2, pt3, pt4) {    const alp = (pt2[1] - pt1[1]) / (pt2[0] - pt1[0]);    const bet = (pt4[1] - pt3[1]) / (pt4[0] - pt3[0]);    if ((alp - bet) > -0.01 && (alp - bet) < 0.01) { return [(pt2[0] + pt3[0]) * 0.5, (pt2[1] + pt3[1]) * 0.5] }    else {        const intersectx = ((alp * pt1[0]) - (bet * pt3[0]) + (pt3[1] - pt1[1])) / (alp - bet);        return [intersectx, (alp * (intersectx - pt1[0])) + pt1[1]];    }}function pointSide(ptA, ptB, ptC) {    const X = (ptB[0] - ptA[0]) * (ptC[1] - ptA[1]) - (ptB[1] - ptA[1]) * (ptC[0] - ptA[0]);    if (X < 0) { return true } else { return false }}const startctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ start }}');const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const p1 = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p0').value;const ikfkfrkangsids = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value;const s1 = ikfkfrkangsids[0];const s3 = ikfkfrkangsids[1];const angles = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value;const a1mod = degreesToRadians(angles[0]);const a2mod = degreesToRadians(angles[1]);const p2ikfkfrk = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value;const p3ikfkfrk = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value;const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const c2 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Middle Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const c1 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Start Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const c3 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('End Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const a1taperOffAng = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / s3, -1, 1));const r3low = [c2 * Math.sin(a1taperOffAng), s3 + c2 * Math.cos(a1taperOffAng)];const r3up = [c1 * Math.sin(a1taperOffAng), c1 * Math.cos(a1taperOffAng)];const a2taperOffAng = Math.acos(clamp((c2 - c3) / s1, -1, 1));const r1low = [c3 * Math.sin(a2taperOffAng), s1 + c3 * Math.cos(a2taperOffAng)];const r1up = [c2 * Math.sin(a2taperOffAng), c2 * Math.cos(a2taperOffAng)];const upr = rotpoint(add([r3up[0], -r3up[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const udr = rotpoint(add([r3low[0], -r3low[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const lpr = rotpoint(add([r1up[0], -r1up[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const ldr = rotpoint(add([r1low[0], -r1low[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const upl = rotpoint(add([-r3up[0], -r3up[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const udl = rotpoint(add([-r3low[0], -r3low[1]], p1), p1, a1mod);const lpl = rotpoint(add([-r1up[0], -r1up[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const ldl = rotpoint(add([-r1low[0], -r1low[1]], p2ikfkfrk), p2ikfkfrk, a2mod);const rjoint = intersect(upr, udr, lpr, ldr);const ljoint = intersect(upl, udl, lpl, ldl);let outerJoint = rjoint;if (pointSide(p1, p2ikfkfrk, p3ikfkfrk)) {	outerJoint = ljoint;	}createPath([outerJoint, p2ikfkfrk], [], [], false);

properties.name: End
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}'); const angles = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value;const diff = Math.abs(angles[0] - angles[1]);linear(diff, thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Minimum Angle'), thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Maximum Angle'), 0, 100)

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Tip Length'); const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Tip Width') * 0.5; const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('End Width') * 0.5; let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const handScale = scaleFacs * 100;[handScale, handScale]

properties.name: Rotation
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');((thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Auto-rotate') * 0.01) * endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value[1]) + linear(thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Auto-rotate'), 0, 100, (endctrl.effect('Limber')('Clockwise') > 0 ? 270:90), (endctrl.effect('Limber')('Clockwise') > 0 ? 90:-90))+(endctrl.effect('Limber')('Clockwise') > 0 ? thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Tip Angle'): -thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Tip Angle'));

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value[1];const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('End Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Middle Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value[0];const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Middle Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Finger')('Start Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFactor = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_main_data_01')('scaleFactor').value[0];const widthScale = endctrl.effect('Limber')('Width Scale')* 0.01;scaleFacs = scaleFactor * widthScale;[scaleFacs, 0]
